name: servicenow
label: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow connector provides functionality to create, read, update and delete records of Table and Catalog type

arguments.security_incidents_phase_map: {'16': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Identification') }}, '18': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Containment') }}, '19': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Eradication') }}, '20': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Recovery') }}, '100': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Review') }}, '3': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Closed') }}, '10': {{'IncidentPhase'| picklist('Draft') }}}
arguments.security_incidents_sIRCategory_map: {'Confidential personal identity data exposure': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Confidential personal identity data exposure') }}, 'Criminal activity/investigation': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Criminal activity/investigation') }}, 'Denial of Service': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Denial of Service') }}, 'Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) violation': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) violation') }}, 'Equipment loss': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Equipment loss') }}, 'Malicious code activity': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Malicious code activity') }}, 'No Incident': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('No Incident') }}, 'Policy violation': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Policy violation') }}, 'Privilege Escalation': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Privilege Escalation') }}, 'Reconnaissance activity': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Reconnaissance activity') }}, 'Rogue server or service': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Rogue server or service') }}, 'Spam source': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Spam source') }}, 'Phishing': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Phishing') }}, 'Un-patched vulnerability': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Un-patched vulnerability') }}, 'Unauthorized access': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Unauthorized access') }}, 'Web/BBS defacement': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Web/BBS defacement') }}, 'Shared Intelligence': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Shared Intelligence') }}, 'Failed Login': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Failed Login') }}, 'Lost or stolen laptop': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Lost or stolen laptop') }}, 'Malware': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Malware') }}, 'Insider Breach': {{'SIRCategory'| picklist('Insider Breach') }}}

routes.name: Create CyOPs record -> Update Last Incident Pull Time

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Table Name",
    "name": "table_name",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "The table name.",
    "placeholder": "e.g. sn_si_incident",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": "sn_si_incident"
  },
  {
    "title": "Advanced Search Query",
    "name": "advance_search_query",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "A generalized query to search for multiple fields in ServiceNow.",
    "required": false,
    "placeholder": "e.g. state=Analysis",
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": "state=Analysis"
  },
  {
    "title": "Limit",
    "name": "limit",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "The number of records to return.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": "5"
  },
  {
    "title": "Pull Sample Incident in Past X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Incident_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Pull the incidents in the past X minutes. e.g. 14400 minutes are 10 days.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 14400
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Search Table Record -> Create CyOPs record
Get sys id -> Search Table Record
Get ServiceNow data -> Get sys id

arguments.incidents_status_map: {'1': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Open') }}, '2': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('In Progress') }}, '3': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Awaiting') }}, '6,7': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Resolved') }}, '8': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Inactive') }}}
